definition: to avoid/to shun/to flee/to escape/to keep away from/to leave/to hide from
medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison
leaf of the iris/variant of 藥|药[yao4]

sentences.english: Studies clearly show that rifampin decreases the effectiveness of birth control pills in preventing ovulation.
sentences.chinese: 研究清楚显示，利福平会降低避孕药抑制排卵的效力。

sentences.english: Will the first to use contraceptives, "Yasmin", can reduce the dose of their own?
sentences.chinese: 请问初次用避孕药“优思明”，可否自行减小剂量？

sentences.english: Does urgent prophylactic lose mufti action?
sentences.chinese: 常服紧急避孕药有没有负作用？

sentences.english: Birth control pill could put women off macho men.
sentences.chinese: 避孕药可能会使女人对大男人失去性趣。

sentences.english: Oral contraceptives work by reducing androgens .
sentences.chinese: 口服避孕药，会减少雄性激素。

sentences.english: I've not discouraged my daughter from going on the pill now that she's reached the age of discretion .
sentences.chinese: 我女儿已到达解事责任年龄，我不再劝阻她服避孕药。

sentences.english: The use of OCP alone has only a minimal effect in reducing alopecia .
sentences.chinese: 单独使用口服避孕药对减轻脱发只有很小的作用。

sentences.english: Following pregnancy and the discontinuation of contraceptives, the spider angiomas will disappear on their own.
sentences.chinese: 妊娠和避孕药停药后，蜘蛛状血管瘤会自行消失。

sentences.english: It's safe to use the morning-after pill during breast-feeding.
sentences.chinese: 在哺乳期采用紧急避孕药也是安全的。

sentences.english: Birth control pills made her fat and sick, she said.
sentences.chinese: 她说，服用避孕药让她变胖，身子骨变差。

sentences.english: Using the morning-after pill may delay your period by up to one week.
sentences.chinese: 服用事后避孕药可能使月经延后最多一个星期。

sentences.english: Sanger and McCormick felt the female contraceptive could emancipate women.
sentences.chinese: 桑格和麦考密克认为，女性避孕药可以解放妇女。

sentences.english: Combination OCPs alleviate symptoms in about three quarters of patients.
sentences.chinese: 复方避孕药可以减轻四分之三的内异症患者的症状。

sentences.english: A friend of mine confused her valium with her birth control pills.
sentences.chinese: 我的一个朋友拒绝服用避孕药。

sentences.english: Today, more than 70 million women around the world use this oral contraceptive.
sentences.chinese: 如今，全球有超过七千万妇女使用这种口服避孕药。

sentences.english: Today, I was in my 15-year-old sister's room when I found birth control pills.
sentences.chinese: 今天，我在15岁的妹妹的房间发现了避孕药。

definition: corpus luteum (glands in female mammals producing progesterone)
